topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5482a4bf6368723480a00000#post_5482a4bf6368723480a00000
Well more detail.

"Moves like Jagger" Basically works with my mind.

For instance if your stand uses its ability and I see it or get hurt by it i'll just use it against you.

Get punched super hard it breaks a rib? I remember that pain and send it back ten fold. 

Use Zu warudo on me? Since I see how it works I'll use it against you.

BUT if I have never seen something before and I never knew about it I cant Manifest and or copy it.

It also works where if I forget what something is and cant remember it I have to re copy it by looking at it again. and I only can Copy 3 things at a time and the more I copy the weaker one ability gets. 

Shit my stand could copy shit like a meteor but its tiring.
